title: jeemomart
author: jeemomart
content: Hi,Advice me if i should start crypto mining or not in 2022?if yes then can you recommend me list of hardware i should buy?like 6 GPU board ? or 8 GPU? i have in my mind 3080 and 3090.Let me know please

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: jeemomart on July 17, 2022, 11:59:33 AMHi,Advice me if i should start crypto mining or not in 2022?if yes then can you recommend me list of hardware i should buy?like 6 GPU board ? or 8 GPU? i have in my mind 3080 and 3090.Let me know pleaseThe cards you have in mind are both Gddr6x memory and they get really hot memory temperature often creating throttling and thus reducing your hashrate during mining plus damaging the card over the long run.Unless you have a super cooling system to these cards,these are not that recommended as the first mining rig for a newbie,I would suggest you start with maximum of cards of Gddr6,buy a mining motherboard that has enough PCIex slots to run 12 cards so you are covered in case you want to expand further than your 6 cards.The best for me as a card to start is the 3060 ti as one of the most efficient cards in power consumption and also in stability.Whichever way you go do not get in trouble with Gddr6x cards like 3070 ti,3080,3080 ti and 3090 unless you are experienced with such setup which I doubt by reading this post here.

AMD 6700-6800.From the vulgar series, the RTX 2060 super and RTX 2070 video cards are very good.Thank you, how about choosing the grahic card with very less noise ? which graphic card series best for noise reduction?The cards with the lowest power consumption are also the cards with less noise,as the less the power consumption,the less the heat and thus the less the fan spin percentage should be.As the coolest cards which almost make no noise are the Rx 6600 cards from AMD but they have lower hash rate than 3060 ti,they run at 33 Mhsh while the 3060 ti at 61 Mhsh or a bit more.Stick with the 3060 ti as it will not make that big of a noise,except now in summer which needs the fan spinning at least 70% but in winter they will be almost silent,stick with them because 5 of them makes 300 Mhsh or more while 5 of Rx 6600 make like 150 Mhsh.
